channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel(R) Driver & Support Assistant

item.title: CVE-2018-12148|2024-08-05T08:30:57.484Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20driver%20%26%20support%20assistant
item.description: Privilege escalation in file permissions in Intel Driver and Support Assistant before 3.5.0.1 may allow an authenticated user to potentially execute code as administrator via local access.
